backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the dental clinic backend with appointment booking, user profiles, service types, opening hours management, clinic status control, and role-based access control using authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: moving the admin panel link to a subtle fixed bottom-right corner position and styling it with minimal visual emphasis (small icon, reduced opacity).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components (Layout with bottom-right admin button, Header, Footer, forms), pages (HomePage, BookingPage, AdminPage), hooks (useQueries with clinic status/hours management), and styling configurations.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including color variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and component states.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag, page title 'Annaya Dental Care', root div, and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, booking, services, service details, and admin pages, wrapped with QueryClientProvider and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied screen component displaying a shield alert icon, error message for unauthorized admin access attempts, and a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/components/AdminLoginForm.t: Admin login form component with username/password fields, form validation using react-hook-form, credential verification via useAdminAuth hook, error handling, and loading states.
A comprehensive appointment booking form component with date/time selection, service type mapping, opening hours validation, and success/error states. Uses react-hook-form, lazy-loaded calendar, and integrates with backend booking mutations.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Displays contact information (location, phone, email, hours) in a card layout with icons and a WhatsApp button. Uses scroll animations for visual effects.
frontend/src/components/DoctorsSection.t: Showcases three dental professionals with avatars, names, and specializations in a responsive grid layout. Includes scroll-triggered animations for each doctor card.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with clinic branding, contact details, quick links, and attribution to caffeine.ai. Displays current year and social links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with responsive menu, route and scroll-based navigation, active section highlighting, and mobile hamburger menu. Includes phone number and booking CTA.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Dual-image hero section with reception area photo and promotional banner, featuring CTAs for booking appointments and contacting the clinic with gradient overlays.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that includes Header, Footer, and Outlet for nested routes, plus a subtle admin access button in the bottom-right corner.
Displays a grid of dental service cards with icons, images, descriptions, and links to detailed service pages and booking. Uses scroll animations and hover effects for visual engagement.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Renders patient testimonials in an auto-playing carousel with star ratings, includes a before/after treatment results showcase image, and pauses autoplay on hover.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: Displays feature cards highlighting clinic advantages (expert doctors, modern tech, emergency care, pricing) and a photo gallery of clinic facilities, both with scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Manages admin authentication state using sessionStorage with hardcoded credentials, providing login, logout, and authentication check functions with extensive console logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and auth client creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating appointment data, user profiles, clinic status, and opening hours using the backend actor. Includes hooks for getting all appointments, searching by service type, managing user profiles, and controlling clinic operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom React hook that uses IntersectionObserver to trigger animations when elements scroll into view. Supports configurable threshold, trigger-once behavior, and respects user's reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file with Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, and keyframe animations for various UI effects (fade-in, slide-up, pulse, form entrance, etc.).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page for managing appointments, user profiles, clinic status, and opening hours. Includes authentication checks, appointment filtering/sorting, and forms for editing clinic settings and admin profile.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Simple booking page that displays the AppointmentForm component with a back button to home and introductory text about scheduling appointments.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that composes multiple section components: HeroSection, ServicesSection, WhyChooseUsSection, DoctorsSection, TestimonialsSection, and ContactSection.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Detailed service information page that displays comprehensive descriptions, procedures, benefits, and features for individual dental services based on URL parameters. Includes service data for various treatments like checkups, root canals, implants, whitening, braces, and pediatric care.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services overview page displaying a grid of dental service cards with icons, descriptions, images, and durations. Each card links to detailed service pages and uses scroll animations for visual effects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens for a component library.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting existing features and a new feature request to move the admin panel link to a subtle, fixed position in the bottom-right corner.
